symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature above normal (38°C/100.4°F)

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.description: Pain in the head or upper neck area

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.description: Forceful expulsion of air from the lungs

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.description: Pain or irritation in the throat

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.description: Extreme tiredness or lack of energy

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.description: Feeling of sickness with urge to vomit

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.description: Forceful expulsion of stomach contents

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.description: Loose or watery bowel movements

symptoms.name: Stomach Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the abdominal area

symptoms.name: Muscle Aches
symptoms.description: Pain or soreness in muscles

symptoms.name: Joint Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in joints such as knees, elbows, or shoulders

symptoms.name: Difficulty Breathing
symptoms.description: Shortness of breath or trouble breathing

symptoms.name: Chest Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the chest area

symptoms.name: Dizziness
symptoms.description: Feeling lightheaded or unsteady

symptoms.name: Runny Nose
symptoms.description: Nasal discharge or congestion

symptoms.name: Sneezing
symptoms.description: Involuntary expulsion of air from nose and mouth

symptoms.name: Skin Rash
symptoms.description: Red, irritated, or inflamed skin

symptoms.name: Itching
symptoms.description: Uncomfortable sensation causing desire to scratch

symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.description: Enlargement of body parts due to fluid retention

symptoms.name: Loss of Appetite
symptoms.description: Reduced desire to eat

symptoms.name: Weight Loss
symptoms.description: Unintentional reduction in body weight

symptoms.name: Insomnia
symptoms.description: Difficulty falling asleep or staying asleep

symptoms.name: Excessive Sleepiness
symptoms.description: Feeling very sleepy during normal waking hours

symptoms.name: Anxiety
symptoms.description: Feelings of worry, nervousness, or unease

symptoms.name: Depression
symptoms.description: Persistent feelings of sadness or loss of interest

symptoms.name: Memory Problems
symptoms.description: Difficulty remembering or concentrating

symptoms.name: Blurred Vision
symptoms.description: Unclear or fuzzy vision

symptoms.name: Ear Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or discomfort in the ear

symptoms.name: Hearing Loss
symptoms.description: Reduced ability to hear sounds

symptoms.name: Frequent Urination
symptoms.description: Need to urinate more often than usual

symptoms.name: Painful Urination
symptoms.description: Pain or burning sensation when urinating

symptoms.name: Back Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in the lower, middle, or upper back

symptoms.name: Neck Pain
symptoms.description: Pain or stiffness in the neck area

symptoms.name: Constipation
symptoms.description: Difficulty passing stool or infrequent bowel movements

symptoms.name: Heartburn
symptoms.description: Burning sensation in chest due to acid reflux
